title: God Is My Refuge
verse_text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
insight: When life shakes, God stands unshaken.
one_minute_win: Pause and say: “God, You are my refuge right now.”
declaration: My safety is in God, not circumstance.
related_devotionals: Proverbs 18:10 Devotional - The Name of the Lord Is a Strong Tower
